meanings.definition: A person who drives a wagon.
meanings.sent1: The wagoners guided the horses along the dusty road.
meanings.sent2: The wagoners loaded up the supplies for the long journey.
meanings.sent3: The wagoners joked about racing their wagons for fun.
meanings.sent4: The wagoners were the unsung heroes of the old west.
meanings.sent5: The wagoners' steady hands ensured the safe delivery of goods.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of wagoners traveling together on the trail.
meanings.sent2: The wagoners gathered at the market to sell their goods.
meanings.sent3: The wagoners waved cheerfully as they passed by.
meanings.sent4: The wagoners stood out with their colorful wagons in the parade.
meanings.sent5: The wagoners' camaraderie made the journey more enjoyable.
